dt: {bc}not according to or authorized by law {bc}{sx|unlawful||}, {sx|illicit||}
{bc}not sanctioned by official rules (as of a game)

et: Middle French or Medieval Latin; Middle French {it}illegal{/it}, from Medieval Latin {it}illegalis{/it}, from Latin {it}in-{/it} + {it}legalis{/it} legal
shortdef: not according to or authorized by law : unlawful, illicit; also : not sanctioned by official rules (as of a game)
